extendedInfo.description: If bug exists, please tell us (E-mail), we will fix it as soon as possible.Katsushika Hokusai (èé£¾ åæ, October or November 1760 â May 10, 1849) was a Japanese artist, ukiyo-e painter and printmaker of the Edo period. In his time, he was Japan's leading expert on Chinese painting. Born in Edo (now Tokyo), Hokusai is best-known as author of the woodblock print series Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji (å¯å¶½ä¸åå­æ¯ Fugaku SanjÅ«roku-kei, c. 1831) which includes the internationally recognized print, The Great Wave off Kanagawa, created during the 1820s.In her courtesy of 46 wallpapers and icons.You can change the Wallpapers from the menu by selecting âChoose Wallpaperâ. The first five Wallpapers are stored in the application. Everyone else will be downloaded from the Internet and stored in a folder(wallpaper _duomob).This theme is compatible with Crazy Home Pro, Crazy Home Lite, ADW Launcher, Live Home, Open Home, Open Home 6, aHome, 91 Panda Home, 91 Panda Home 2.If using Crazy Home, once it is installed and running, press your Menu Key -> Crazy Menu -> Appearance -> Set Theme.If using ADW.Launcher, once it is installed and running, press your Menu Key -> More -> ADWSettings -> Themes Preferences.If using Go Launcher Ex, once it is installed and running, press your Menu Key -> Themes-> Select theme-> Apply.This application does not violate the copyright and does not claim to it.All that is in this appendix are collected from free sources.If you are the author of the material or the copyright holder for it and against its use in this, please contact me and the material will be removed or will be listed your copyright.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Pans across the picture, as you slide left and right through the launcher screens.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good variety
reviews.comment: Great variety of prints to choose from. I wish we could choose where to crop the image and had the option to use the wallpapers for the lock screen as well. The majority of the image is cut off and you can\'t resize it as far as I can tell. But the image quality is great.
reviews.author: Sarah Cobos

reviews.title: A perfect theme.
reviews.comment: Amazing. I think I counted 46 different wallpapers. All of them beautiful. And as well is that, they are historical japanese art. That is always a bonus.  This theme is a gem. <3
reviews.author: A Google User
